author: Universal Pictures
description:
As the FBI convoy moves through Riyadh, they’re suddenly ambushed by terrorists in a brutal roadside attack. Ronald Fleury (Jamie Foxx) and Janet Mayes (Jennifer Garner) are pinned down as chaos erupts around them.
